gobblin.runtime.api

Interface JobTemplate

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable, Spec
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HOCONInputStreamJobTemplate, InheritingJobTemplate, ResourceBasedJobTemplate, StaticJobTemplate

    public interface JobTemplate
extends Spec
    An interface for claiming methods used for retrieving template configs and properties that are required by user to fit in.

    Each data source may have its own Job Template. Examples are available based on requests.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes
